name: happy-hour-threat-level-orange
title: Happy Hour: Threat Level Orange
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• MTSU is starting to look like quite the new hotbed for terrorism with yet another evacuation due to a suspicious package camped outside of Peck Hall. Good news is, it turned out to be a box of paper towels. [WKRN]
  • Continuing the rash of uncoolness in Green Hills, the GameStop on Glen Echo was robbed at gunpoint last night. It doesn’t seem to have anything to do with the Roma’s Pizza shooting and no one was hurt this time, but the robbers are still on the loose. [WSMV]
  • There was also a shooting last night near Belmont on South Douglas Avenue, but no one seems to have any details on that one. [WSMV]
  • Happy news for the day, though: Brad Paisley and his wife are expecting Kid #2 in April. [Tennessean]

Photo by worthbak.
